Message.Issue: Mark the entry point method 'Program.Main(string[])' in assembly 'PacmanServer.exe' with an STAThreadAttribute.

Message.TypeName: Do not dispose objects multiple times
Message.Issue: Object 'pacman' can be disposed more than once in method 'Form1.timer1_Tick(object, EventArgs)'. To avoid generating a System.ObjectDisposedException you should not call Dispose more than one time on an object.: Lines: 90
Implement IDisposable on 'Server' because it creates members of the following IDisposable types: 'Timer'.
'Server.addClient(IClientApp)' locks on a reference of type 'Server'. Replace this with a lock against an object with strong-identity.
'Server.addClient(IClientApp)' locks on a reference of type 'Server'. Replace this with a lock against an object with strong-identity.

Rule.TypeName: Do not dispose objects multiple times
Rule.Name: Do not dispose objects multiple times
Rule.Description: A correctly implemented Dispose method can be called multiple times without throwing an exception. However, this is not guaranteed and to avoid generating a System.ObjectDisposedException you should not call Dispose more than one time on an object.
Rule.Resolution: Object {0} can be disposed more than once in method {1}. To avoid generating a System.ObjectDisposedException you should not call Dispose more than one time on an object.: Lines: 90

Rule.Name: Do not lock on objects with weak identity
Rule.Description: Don't take locks on objects that may bleed across AppDomains or that don't have a strong identity.
Rule.Resolution: {0} locks on a reference of type {1}. Replace this with a lock against an object with strong-identity.

Rule.Name: Mark Windows Forms entry points with STAThread
Rule.Description: Assemblies that reference System.Windows.Forms should have the STAThreadAttribute. Failure to apply this attribute will most likely result in an application that does not work. Windows Forms relies on a number of components that use the STA model.
Rule.Resolution: Mark the entry point method {0} in assembly {1} with an STAThreadAttribute.

Rule.Name: Types that own disposable fields should be disposable
Rule.Description: Types that declare disposable members should also implement IDisposable. If the type does not own any unmanaged resources, do not implement a finalizer on it.
Rule.Resolution: Implement IDisposable on {0} because it creates members of the following IDisposable types: {1}.
